Class FileHelper

java.lang.Object
  utilities.FileHelper

public class FileHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Nested Class Summary
 class FileHelper.ImageFilter
          Inner class extending FileFilter to allow a JFileChooser to only accept files with an extension indicative of an image file.
 class FileHelper.PDFFilter
          Inner class extending FileFilter to allow a JFileChooser to only accept PDF files with an extension indicative of a text file.
 class FileHelper.TextFilter
          Inner class extending FileFilter to allow a JFileChooser to only accept files with an extension indicative of a text file.

Constructor Detail

FileHelper

public FileHelper()
Constructor used to provide access to the various inner classes of FileHelper. Also serves to get the path of the directory that this program and it's asssociated files are in.

copyFile

public static Path copyFile(java.io.File soure,
                            Path target)
Copies the specified source file to the target destination.

Parameters:
source - - file to copy
target - - absolute path of the location to copy the source file to

copyPhoto

public static Path copyPhoto(java.io.File original)
Copies the specified photo file into the Photos directory associated with the program.

Parameters:
original - - file to copy into 'Photos' directory

copyShiftCdrReport

public static Path copyShiftCdrReport(java.io.File original)
Copies a Shift Commander Summary Report into the UMPD Management Program's program files. Makes a copy of the specified file and places the copy into the program's Documents/ShiftCdrReports subdirectory.

Parameters:
original - - the original report file
Returns:
the path of the newly created file, which is an exact copy of the original
